zombie.domain

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • zombie.domain.Level

  • public class Level
extends Object
    Class to hold information about current levels variables

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(int lvlNumber, int zombieAmount) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLvlNumber()
      Method returns current level number
      int getZombieAmount()
      Method returns the total amount of zombies on current level
      int getZombiesLeftOnLevel()
      Method returns the amount of zombies on the current level which aren't killed yet
      int getZombiesUnreleased()
      Method returns how many zombies are waiting to be released on current level
      boolean isLevelOver()
      Method tells whether the current level is over or not, that is that is there zombies left which aren't killed
      void newLevel()
      Method should be called when the level is changed
      void setZombieAmount(int zombieAmount)
      Method sets new amount of zombies to the current level
      void zombieKilled()
      Method should be called every time zombie is killed
      void zombieReleased()
      Method should be called every time a zombie is released
